Package Maze.BoardObjects.Tiles

Class AbstractTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze.BoardObjects.Tiles.AbstractTile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeathTile, ExitLock, ExitPortal, FreeTile, InfoField, Key, LockedDoor, Treasure, Wall
    public abstract class AbstractTile
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the Tile interface, all other tiles object will use the methods within this abstract class.
    Author:
    michael tang 300490290

    • Method Detail

      • interact

        public abstract boolean interact​(Player player)
        The tile interacts with the player, returning true if the player can move on to the tile and false if they can't.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that interacts with the tile.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the actor can move on to this tile, false if not.

      • setChangedTile

        public void setChangedTile()
        Sets the tile to its changed state. Used for when loading in a saved level. Doesn't change state by default.

      • unChange

        public void unChange()
        Change the tile back to its original state.
